thread.section_title: HDIS Reviews | Customer Service Reviews of HDIS | www.hdis.com | 4 of 112
thread.title: Laurel

author: Laurel
title: Laurel
text: If I had wanted or been able to get out and go to the store, I would not have ordered from this site. Now I have to find someone to pick up at post office since that is where delivery was made. Instead of being easier, it is now more difficult. Totally disappointed! Will be sure to bad mouth the company to any one I know that uses these products and needs the ease of home delivery. It is not home delivery if you still have to go get it.
